description: This table includes the majority of patient contact demographic info, general relationship info, and patient-level relationship info. The records included in this table are Patient Relationships (RLA) records.

columns.name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient contact record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category ID for the patient contact


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient this patient contact is added to.

columns.name: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact should be displayed at the patient level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: Patient contact's name.  This column only displays names that are stored directly on patient contact records and will be blank for patient contact records that are linked to different patient records.  Use the PAT_RELATIONSHIP_RECORD_NAME column instead if you want a single column that will display the names of both linked and unlinked patient contact records.

columns.name: GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The gender category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: Patient contact's date of birth.

columns.name: HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Patient contact's house number.

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: Patient contact's city of residence.

columns.name: STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state category ID for the patient contact's residence.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ZIP_CODE
columns.description: Patient contact's postal code.

columns.name: DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district category ID for the patient contact's residence.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: OCCUPATION
columns.description: Patient contact's occupation.

columns.name: INTERP_NEEDED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact requires a language interpreter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: HEARING_IMPAIRED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact is hard of hearing.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: VISUALLY_IMPAIRED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact has low vision.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: SPEC_NEED_IMPAIR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hearing and vision special needs category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient contact was created.

columns.name: PREFERRED_LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The preferred language category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISPLAY_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Stores the order in which patient-level contacts display.

columns.name: SOCIAL_CLOSENESS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The social closeness category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SAME_HOUSEHOLD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact lives in the same household as the patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: SUPPORT_NETWORK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact is part of the patient's support network.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: CUSTODY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The custody category ID for the patient contact


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GUARDIAN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact is the patient's legal guardian.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: PROTECTION_ORDER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a protection order has been filed against the patient contact.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: LAST_REV_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the last instant that this record's relationship information was reviewed or updated from a patient-level encounter.

columns.name: LAST_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who most recently reviewed or updated this patient contact's information from a patient-level encounter.

columns.name: NOTIFY_ON_ADMSN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact should be notified when the patient is admitted.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: LEGAL_RELATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The legal relationship category ID for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Health Care Agent


First Alternate Health Care Agent


Second Alternate Health Care Agent

columns.name: ACTV_HLTHCR_AGENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact is an active health care agent for the patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: GENERIC_CAT_1_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer-labeled category item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GENERIC_CAT_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer-labeled category item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GENERIC_CAT_3_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer-labeled category item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GENERIC_CAT_4_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer-labeled category item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GENERIC_STRING_1
columns.description: Customer-labeled string item.

columns.name: GENERIC_STRING_2
columns.description: Customer-labeled string item.

columns.name: GENERIC_STRING_3
columns.description: Customer-labeled string item.

columns.name: GENERIC_STRING_4
columns.description: Customer-labeled string item.

columns.name: AUTH_LETTER_RECIPIENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient contact is authorized to receive appointment letters.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: SEND_LETTERS_BY_DEFAULT_YN
columns.description:
Indicate whether the patient contact should receive appointment letters about the patient by default.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_LEVEL_RELATIONSHIP_YN

columns.name: LIMITATION_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The limitation code category ID for a supervisory patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RESPONSIBILITY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The responsibility code category ID for a supervisory patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AUTHORITY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The authority code category ID for a supervisory patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: BUSINESS_IDENT
columns.description: The unique ID of the business for a supervisory patient contact.

columns.name: PENDING_PAT_LEGAL_RELATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending Healthcare Agent (HCA) relationship category ID for the patient contact.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LEGAL_RELATION_C_NAME

columns.name: ACP_UPD_REJECTION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The rejection reason category ID for the advance care plan (ACP).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Invalid signature


Missing documentation


Inconsistent documentation


Illegible


Invalid form


Missing signature


Relationship doesn't match document


Relationship not supported by current documentation


Contact name and document do not match

columns.name: ACP_UPD_REJECTION_REASON_TEXT
columns.description: The patient-facing rejection reason for an update to the advance care plan (ACP).

columns.name: ACP_UPD_MYCHART_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the MyChart user who updated the advance care plan (ACP).

columns.name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient contact record. If the patient contact record is linked to a different patient's record, the name will come from the patient record. Otherwise, it will come from the name stored directly on the patient contact record.  If your organization does not allow users to link patient contacts to other patient records, this column will act the same as the NAME column in this table.

columns.name: ORDER_ISSUED_TASK_C_NAME
columns.description:
The issued order category ID for the patient contact with regard to the division of tasks amongst patient guardians.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LIVING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The living status category ID for the patient contact. Epic releases statuses of Alive and Deceased. Missing statuses are treated as Alive.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Alive


Deceased

columns.name: PAT_CONTACT_ROW_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient contact type category ID for a patient contact. This column uses 0 for Person and 1 for Organization.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Person


Organization

columns.name: ORG_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility linked to a patient contact.

columns.name: ORG_RELIG_AFFL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the religious affiliation linked to an organization patient contact.

columns.name: ORG_RELIG_AFFL_ID_RELIG_AFFIL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the religious affiliation organization.

columns.name: ORG_WEBSITE
columns.description: A website URL for the organization patient contact.

columns.name: ORG_FAX_NUMBER
columns.description: The fax number for an organization patient contact.

columns.name: ORG_PRIMARY_CONTACT
columns.description: The representative or point person for an organization contact.

columns.name: ORG_PRIMARY_CONTACT_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number for the organization primary contact.

columns.name: ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department linked to a patient contact.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique id of the MyChart account associated with the patient contact, primarily for the purpose of granting the contact proxy access to the patient.

columns.name: FREETEXT_COMMENT
columns.description: A free text comment on the contact

columns.name: PRIMARY_OR_FIRST_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number of a patient contact. This is the primary phone number if one is marked primary, otherwise this is the first phone number listed for the patient contact. If the patient contact is linked to another record, this phone number is from the linked record, otherwise this phone number is from the patient contact record.
